long_description: The Platypus GravityWorks(TM)/CleanStream(TM) replacement reservoir kit includes two 4-liter reservoirs, 1 for dirty water and 1 for clean water. Replacement reservoir kit keeps your Platypus GravityWorks or CleanStream water filter system (sold separately) in tip-top shape. Dirty reservoir features a quick-disconnect valve that automatically shuts off the flow of water when the filter hose (sold separately) is disconnected. Reservoirs feature SlimeGuard(TM) antimicrobial treatment that won't impart a taste on your water. Reservoirs have hang loops for easy in-camp use.
short_description: The Platypus GravityWorks(TM)/CleanStream(TM) replacement reservoir kit includes two 4-liter reservoirs, 1 for dirty water and 1 for clean water.
